divs: Sighting Detailsseveral white orbs about 500 ft above ground traveling from east to west. orbs at ends of line moved up and down and entire mass appeared, as if, to be riding a wave. when it was far away, both inbound and outbound, it appeared a one unit. only when directly overhead could you tell it was several separate orbs.
Summary: white orbs traveling east to west just above tree's
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around October 12th 2013
